author: rjollos
msg: `multiproduct.env.ProductEnvironment`: Add unit test for `path` attribute laziness. Refs #595.

author: danielsh
msg: This actually reuses some of backport.pl's internal helper function, so I made
it an alias to backport.pl that switches on argv[0].  This works for now; using
a proper library (stdlib or otherwise) may be done in the future.
> % ../t1/tools/dist/nominate.pl r1511215 "No real reason, just testing the script."
< +     No real reason, just testing the script.
(): Dispatch to backport_main() or nominate_main() based on $0.

author: desruisseaux
msg: Remove 0.3 tag before new release attempt.

author: rjollos
msg: `multiproduct.env.ProductEnvironment`: Removed private `_abs_href` attribute, made unnecessary by use of `lazy` decorator. Refs #595.

author: andygumbrecht
msg: Finals, formatting and several minor optimizations.
